name: Aiden Cornforth
about: I am a second-year Mechanical Engineering student at the University of Kentucky. My passion for physics and mathematics began in high school, leading me to pursue a degree where I can apply these skills to make an impact. I am also actively involved in Young Life as a volunteer leader, managing events and mentoring others.

experience.title: Volunteer College Leader
experience.description: Managed Christian ministry events, collaborated with university and church entities, and mentored college students through planning and relationship-building.

experience.title: Inside Sales Engineer Co-op
experience.description: Analyzed project plans, communicated with manufacturers and customers, and handled equipment selections for hydronic applications to meet project needs.

experience.title: YMCA Summer Camp Counselor
experience.description: Provided care for children aged 5-7, built relationships with children and staff, and used creativity to develop engaging activities.

experience.title: YMCA Summer Camp Counselor
experience.description: Cared for children aged 8-15, maintained relationships with counselors and parents, and utilized creative methods to entertain children.

awards.title: Young Life Leader
awards.description: Appointed as a Young Life Leader after months of training to manage and run Christian ministry events at the University of Kentucky.

awards.title: Engineering Scholarship Recipient
awards.issuer: University of Kentucky College of Engineering
awards.description: Awarded for academic excellence and potential in the field of engineering.

awards.title: Presidential Scholarship Recipient
awards.description: Recognized for outstanding academic performance and leadership.

awards.title: Governor's Scholar
awards.description: Selected as a Governor's Scholar for academic achievement, leadership, and service.
